message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it has tremendous value for your business, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. My initial offer is $1200000. I'm open to negotiating, but I'm sure you'll agree that this price reflects the significant value of this opportunity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. While I understand its worth to my business, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $900000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly from my initial offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.  Let's meet in the middle at $1050000. This is a significant investment for you, but it will be a smart one that will deliver long-term benefits. I'm confident that this offer is still a great deal for both of us.

Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000. This price aligns more closely with my financial planning while still recognizing the value of the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $950000 simply isn't enough to make this deal work for me.  We're both close to an agreement.  I'm willing to make a final concession. Let's close this deal at $1000000.  This is a fair price that acknowledges your budget and still allows me to make a good profit. It's a win-win for both of us.
